title: "License Plate Readers Face Legal Challenge in South Carolina"
excerpt: "A petition filed with the South Carolina Supreme Court alleges that automatic license plate readers are part of a growing system of “unlawful and unaccountable surveillance” overseen by the state’s Law Enforcement Division."
